title: TRIVERSAL Bike Pedal Straps Bicycle Pedal Straps Universal Toe Clips Foot Straps Reflective Pedal Straps for BMX, Fixed Gear Bike, Mountain, Road Bike
features: ✅EXTRA ROAD SAFETY: The bike pedal straps have a reflective strip on each strap to add extra safety caution while riding whether that's early morning, midday, or evenings.

✅MULTIPLE BIKE STYLES: The bicycle pedal straps can be utilized with multiple style bikes like bmx, mountain bike, road bike, and at home exercise bike. we suggest adult bikes but they are compatible with youth bikes.
✅FUNCTION: Adjustable nylon velcro make for easy adjustment for your foot size and comfort. Prevents slipping off the pedals while riding, exercising, or practicing your next trick.
✅100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEED: We take pride in our product and offering the best for our customers. If for any reason you aren't satisfied we offer 100% money back.
